title: Shop: Endomet Supplements & Saunas | The Elevate Institute
author: Eva Vennari
description: Clients receive 10% off Endo-met supplements with code while enrolled in REVEAL: shop Endo-met supplements and near infrared sauna panels.
cleaned_text: The Elevate Institute Shop Welcome to our supplement and sauna shop - the place where you can finally get personalized health support that's just for you! It's like having a personal health genie in a bottle, except without the weird beard and funky smell. Shop Endo-met and near-infrared saunas So, go ahead, do more than browse, and pick out the Endo-met, and other pre-screened [supplements](http://www.arltma.com/Supplements/Product_Catalog/) that can help you feel your best based on your [REVEAL Program](https://theelevateinstitute.com/revealhma/) recommendations. You'll be amazed at how easy and enjoyable it is to take care of your health when you have personalized support. And who knows, you might even find yourself looking forward to taking your daily supplements, like they're your own personal happy pills. ALL PRODUCTS Showing 1-12 of 48 results
